name: SDA Marathon / Games Done Quick (Dark Style)
description: iotku's dark theme for gamesdonequick.com, Continuously updated!
additional_info:
Follow me on twitter @iotku, it really helps me out.

If you have an issue with this style feel free to tweet at me and I'll try to fix it, I check twitter more often than anything else.

Change Log ([m]m/dd/yy):
01/06/19: Update for new Front Page for AGDQ2019
05/26/17: Fix merch page
7/3/16: fix hilighting schedule 
4/3/16: Fix background being white
12/29/15: Fix most outstanding known issues (Happy New Year!)
11/29/15: Fix background color for successful submissions
7/23/15: Fix Header text being hard to read, fix submission table issues
5/20/15: Small Fixes
4/21/15: Fix Submission page for SGDQ2015
1/23/15: Fix Announcement being unreadable/white
1/4/15: Couple minor fixes, Happy AGDQ Everyone.
8/18/14.2: Color Code table, still needs some work
8/18/14: Fix table background color for submissions page (and hopefully not break something else in the proecss
6/24/14: Solve issue (hopefully) where sometimes urls without a trailing / wouldn't have styles applied or vise versa 
6/22/14.4: Fix ticker fade effect
6/22/14.3: Change ticker background color
6/22/14.2: remove borders on twitch video/ change chat tab colors
6/22/14: Apply style to SGDQ faq / Sponsors page 

5/13/14: Apply style to https site also

4/24/14: Remove borders that don't match the new style

4/23/14: Update for SGDQ2014 new style

8:23PM 1/4/14: Only effect front page and schedule 

Initial Release
